name: react-typescript-electron-web-quickstart
description: A quick start example with configured ReactJS, Webpack, Electron and even Web deployment

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && node_modules\.bin\electron-packager dist "SPDocKitInsights"  --version-string.FileDescription="SPDocKit Insights" --version-string.ProductName="SPDocKit Insights" --version-string.LegalCopyright="Copyright Â© Acceleratio Ltd. 2017" --version-string.CompanyName="Acceleratio Ltd." --version-string.OriginalFilename="SPDocKitInsights.exe" --icon electron\SPDocKitInsights.ico --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --asar --out=electronDist\bin --overwrite --build-version=7.0.0.0

author: Hrvoje Bagaric
